full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 208 of 236 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross 1 Q. Mr. Parkinson, do you see those photographs in front of you, Government Exhibit 235 and 292? 2 A. I do. 3 Q. Those depict the windy staircase that we just looked at on the diagram; right? 4 A. True. 5 Q. And do you see, especially in 292, that shows the left-hand side wall that goes up the windy staircase; right? 6 A. It does. 7 Q. You don't see any photographs or pictures on that wall, do you? 8 A. No, sir. 9 Q. There are no pictures on the wall to the side of the windy staircase? 10 A. No. 11 Q. Now, I'd like to take a look again at what's in evidence as Government Exhibit 234. 12 MR. PAGLIUCA: Sealed. 13 THE COURT: That's sealed. 14 MR. EVERDELL: That's sealed, okay. So if I could direct the witness's attention to Government Exhibit 234, if we can place it on the screen for the witness, the Court, and the Court's deputy. I don't think I have a copy for the witness. Can I borrow your binder. May I approach, your Honor? 15 I'm getting confused choreography, your Honor. I 16 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018309
